mapper.select: select o_id, u_id, ts_id, ot_id, o_tile, o_state, o_image, o_describe, o_end_time, o_create_time from order where o_id = #{oId}
mapper.insert: insert into running_db.order(u_id, ts_id, ot_id, o_tile, o_state, o_image, o_describe, o_end_time, o_create_time) values (#{uId}, #{tsId}, #{otId}, #{oTile}, #{oState}, #{oImage}, #{oDescribe}, #{oEndTime}, #{oCreateTime})

insert into order(u_id, ts_id, ot_id, o_tile, o_state, o_image, o_describe, o_end_time, o_create_time) values
(#{entity.uId}, #{entity.tsId}, #{entity.otId}, #{entity.oTile}, #{entity.oState}, #{entity.oImage}, #{entity.oDescribe}, #{entity.oEndTime}, #{entity.oCreateTime})

insert into order(u_id, ts_id, ot_id, o_tile, o_state, o_image, o_describe, o_end_time, o_create_time) values
(#{entity.uId}, #{entity.tsId}, #{entity.otId}, #{entity.oTile}, #{entity.oState}, #{entity.oImage}, #{entity.oDescribe}, #{entity.oEndTime}, #{entity.oCreateTime})
on duplicate key update u_id = values(u_id), ts_id = values(ts_id), ot_id = values(ot_id), o_tile = values(o_tile), o_state = values(o_state), o_image = values(o_image), o_describe = values(o_describe), o_end_time = values(o_end_time), o_create_time = values(o_create_time)
mapper.update:
update order
u_id = #{uId},
ts_id = #{tsId},
ot_id = #{otId},
o_tile = #{oTile},
o_state = #{oState},
o_image = #{oImage},
o_describe = #{oDescribe},
o_end_time = #{oEndTime},
o_create_time = #{oCreateTime},
where o_id = #{oId}
